|brand = Cisco |model = WAP4410N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/02/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Cisco_WAP4410N |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-WAP4410N |icid = 3839A-WAP4410N |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9132; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS16M16CS-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:26:0B, C8:4C:75, D0:D0:FD |oui = 00:26:0B, C8:4C:75, D0:D0:FD
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.245 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ciscosb |defaultssid_regex = ^ciscosb$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/22/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883583362 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001IYCMNA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9103; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/wireless/access_point/csbap/wap4410n/administration/guide/WAP4410N_Admin_Guide.pdf Manual]
OEM SerComm (YKB00C-1)
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''ciscosb'''.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/cisco-wap4410n/68114 |forumpage2 = https://forum.archive.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=44837 |forumpage3 = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/linsys-wap4410n-problems-with-partitions/79027 |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
